sentence.Network_en: Mildly cover facial defects, inhibit the formation of melanin, quickly remove sallowness and dullness.
sentence.Network_cn: 温和遮盖脸部瑕疵, 抵制黑色素的形成, 快速去除肌肤黄气及暗沉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 3. 改善肤色蜡黄(sallowness) 菸硷胺具有抗醣基化(antiglycation)性质，涂抹菸硷胺可明显改善肤色蜡黄现象，在皮肤生理上的可能机 …

list.abs: 排泄糟粕　excretion of waste material面色萎黄　sallow complexion髓海不足　insufficiency of marrow-sea
参考文献 ... 垂柳 green weeping-willow；Babylonian willow 黄花柳 goat willow；sallow willow 灰毛柳 grey willow.
The girl ' s face looks sallow ., 这姑娘脸色显得憔悴.
They have dark hair , sallow skin and grey green eyes ., 他们黑头发 , 黄皮肤 , 灰绿色的眼睛.
